website_summaries.verdict: Great option for kids who hate taking long showers and baths.
pros: Easy to use and apply with the pump-action design
cons: Less effective conditioner compared to the real thing

customer_reviews.title: Good soap
customer_reviews.text: Descent product at a really good price. My kids are terrible soap wasters. I stopped buying the expensive stuff (everyone, aveeno, etc) because most of it would go right down the drain. Literally. The kids love the smell. It doesn’t irritate their skin (they both have fairly sensitive skin). And the think the name and bottle are fun. It arrived right on time and in perfect condition. No complaints at our house.
customer_reviews.author: The Missus

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product for my son who hates bath time. Ever since using this product, he has been less fussy about taking baths and is obsessed with the smell of the product. The smell was present but definitely not overwhelming which I appreciate. It's gentle enough for his sensitive skin and does a good job of cleaning him which is rare as my son's skin is very easily irritated. This product is no fuss and works really well. For the price point and the size of this bottle, I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its good but not great
customer_reviews.text: Scent is great and it is easy to use for a great price however it left my kids skin a little dry (one kid I had to stop using it on because her skin is eczema prone) as for the shampoo part its fine and gets hair clean but doesnt particularly make hair silky soft. As a low cost option its a good choice but I probably wont buy again. Also the first time it shipped I had to request a replacement because the top got broken during shipping so the pump part didnt work but it was replaced with no issue.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Burrows

customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this shampoo! I needed a refill of my daughters Suave 3 in 1 in the Shea butter scent but they only had this one. Not only was it cheaper than in store but the container is three times the size! It makes her hair so soft and a lot less tangly in the mornings. I love the smell of it too, I always say she smells like a green jolly rancher 😂 Id highly recommend this stuff, especially as a 3 in 1, SO convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlyn

customer_reviews.title: Smells great, big bottle for cheap price
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised at the size of the bottle that came. I honestly didn't check the oz size when ordering but assumed it was standard shampoo bottle size. This was way bigger and for such a cheap price I felt it was a steal. Cleans my son really well, and it smells great. No skin irritation at all, and he had sensitive skin so I was greatful on that as well. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great smell, needs better packaging during shipping.
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful smell that my son loves! Very fruity and not fake. Makes his hair shiny and easy to comb. Only complaint was that the bottle pump was broken when it arrived, but I just filled another bottle I already had.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hunt

customer_reviews.title: New body wash for the kiddies
customer_reviews.text: The pump was missing a small piece as shown in the photo but I can’t beat having available body wash in such a large quantity. Smells great. Time will tell if it does well on my kids skin since I’m switching to this product to give it a try
customer_reviews.author: Marye Smith

customer_reviews.title: Much better than typical baby shampoo
customer_reviews.text: We've gotten so used to using J. Baby shampoo that we never explore other options. I can't believe if took us 8 years to even think of searching for tear free shampoo. LOL My kids are 6 and 8 and we're still using baby shampoo on them until we found this. smells so much better and lather up really nicely. Never going back to baby shampoo again!
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Bigger than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: Didn't pay attention to the size and was pleasantly surprised when i opened the box and saw this giant bottle. Great value. I noticed others mention dryness of the skin but that's something i notice in most basic kids 3 in 1. Both of my kids shower themselves so they tend to go a little heavy on how much they use. this is a great value.
customer_reviews.author: Geevee

customer_reviews.title: No stings
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a soap to transition my baby to toddler to use. This is perfect! No stings or tears! Highly recommend Please let me know if you found this review helpful:)
customer_reviews.author: Megan S.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this because of the rave reviews of the scent. I just used it and it has zero scent....I mean, NONE! It's a lot of product for the money and it seems to foam up nicely - I used it as a body wash, as well and it rinsed off well. But, if you're looking for a nice-smelling experience...keep on looking.
customer_reviews.author: NYCVillager

customer_reviews.title: Great kid 3-in-1
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this stuff! It has a nice watermelon smell to it, and it makes bath time fun and easy. It’s a very large bottle, even bigger than it seems in the picture. I was very happy about that. The bottle came packaged well with air pillows. No spills, leaks, or broken pumps. I will purchase a second time.
customer_reviews.author: Cam Sherburn

customer_reviews.title: Great all in one product makes bath time easier on mom/dad!
customer_reviews.text: Great all in one product makes bath time easier on mom/dad! My son was sold on this product based on the fact that it was watermelon scented. I want him to enjoy bath time so it isn’t such a chore for either of us. I appreciate that I can just start scrubbing from the top and work my way down with just one product.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy M Kelsch

customer_reviews.title: Good product but damaged in shipping
customer_reviews.text: I purchased two watermelon scents and two apple scents and two of the four bottles came damaged and product spilled throughout the cardboard box, & leaking through the box. My kids love this shampoo/conditioner but we lost some product and have unusable bottles due to poor packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Brown

customer_reviews.title: It’s ok
customer_reviews.text: I brought this for my son to have something easy for when he showers. It’s ok for the body, but not the hair. I don’t like how “dry” feeling his hair would be, so I had him stop using this on his hair, only his body
customer_reviews.author: Rendezvous

customer_reviews.title: Suave Shampoo Conditioner Body wash is great smelling watermelon & makes a good lather
customer_reviews.text: Suave Shampoo Conditioner Body wash is great smelling watermelon & makes a good lather
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Defective pump - waste of money
customer_reviews.text: This is a huge bottle of shampoo and would be good value but the pump broke within a week of use. Try bathing two little kids with this huge bottle and no way to get the shampoo out without removing the pump, getting shampoo all over your hands in the process, trying to put some shampoo in your hand to wash children, then screwing the pump back in. Would not recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Smell of product is good. Shipping was good. The part that irritated me was that the pump didn’t open/work. Had to twist off entire pump and just pour the soap on kids sponges which gets bothersome. Product in itself was fine.
customer_reviews.author: Jai

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for the price, it came quickly and in great shape. I am definitely going to buy this again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Alyssa

customer_reviews.title: Lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my child, but I’ve ended up using it myself. Does the bottle ever end? Daily showers with shampooing and washing...it’s been weeks, and there’s still a bunch left! What a value! The scent is nice but not overpowering. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Mae

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and good 3 in 1
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my 7 years old son to use by himself in the shower. His hair smells nice after using it and it is relatively easy to comb. He does complain that it's hard for him to use the pump.
customer_reviews.author: djairo

customer_reviews.title: Lovely!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my teenager. I use it occasionally as well. The whole house loves it. Great apple scent. Gets everything clean, leaves you feeling moisturized. The bottle is pretty dang big. Do recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa East

customer_reviews.title: It make parents job easier
customer_reviews.text: I like it can wash from head to toe. All in one. Headache free for parents. However the price is a little higher than other brand. But I will buy again since my kids like the watermelon smell.
customer_reviews.author: derek

customer_reviews.title: You pay for what you get.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Apple scent, I do prefer it over the watermelon scent. It comes in a big bottle for a cheap price. The only downfall of this is that the scent does not last long in my sons hair. Also, this product did not cause dry skin or irritation for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: broken bottles dont buy replacement not free
customer_reviews.text: dislike this open box to broken bottles 1 half spilled into box caps busted and i can't send open liquids back. after talking to amazon i thought stuff was settled and free replacement sent but now im sent email to return item after they said to throw them away or charge me
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Great deal
customer_reviews.text: Great deal for kids shampoo. Only issue Is the pump snaps off easily. With kids, that can happen often and quickly. Otherwise great shampoo/soap and big size.
customer_reviews.author: Kayna R.

customer_reviews.title: Great scent
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this shampoo/body wash. It smells like watermelon bubblegum. Unfortunately, it spilled A LOT in the packaging. We got maybe half the liquid.
customer_reviews.author: Pan

customer_reviews.title: Can’t use it ....
customer_reviews.text: Product thrown in boxes and arrived busted with shampoo leaking everywhere. I cannot return item obviously - because bottles are cracked - and leaking ? How to refund or replace ?
customer_reviews.author: Brittany

customer_reviews.title: other items can gat damage from liquid during delivery
customer_reviews.text: Received a damaged bottle. It’s value for money but very pure delivery(( It came to me with a toys for kids and just because pump was broken liquid was everywhere(((
customer_reviews.author: Alena

customer_reviews.title: Smells good
customer_reviews.text: Smells great and has a produced a good amount of bubbles making washing fun for the kids. The smells stays in the hair for a while after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi

customer_reviews.title: Product good but not shipping
customer_reviews.text: The product itself works just fine, but rather disappointed to find that my product came spilt out inside the box and all over the items in my box. Recommend just going to the store and purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Mo4

customer_reviews.title: Wtf
customer_reviews.text: Package couldn’t be delivered because it was leaking...... wth! Update...bottle opened and seeped all over my other things! Who the heck does the packaging???
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Great scent and product
customer_reviews.text: Can I say amazing???? It smells divine and there's so much product for such a great price! It bubbles up the bath water really nicely too!
customer_reviews.author: Nusrat Yasmin

customer_reviews.title: Kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: My kid has sensitive skin. This stuff works great. Smells nice and makes my kid feel like a big kid. Will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Ann Henry

customer_reviews.title: Kids fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love the scent of this. Each bath is fun when this bottle stays. It is gentle and cleans thoroughly. Good product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: NetSavy

customer_reviews.title: Burns eyes
customer_reviews.text: Smells great, nice size bottle but burns my daughter's eyes. She complains about it every time. Back to Johnson's.
customer_reviews.author: VinoSa

customer_reviews.title: Nice scent. Good value.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for the price. Perfect for multiple children and the pump makes it convenient for them to wash up themselves.
customer_reviews.author: RJsMama

customer_reviews.title: Smell good
customer_reviews.text: Love the idea of 3 in 1. My toddler love it, and it smell great. Tear free.. highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: DinoBerryCake

customer_reviews.title: Good for Beginner Washers
customer_reviews.text: Got this shampoo/body wash on sale. It was pretty cheap compared to the body wash my wife and I use. With it being cheap, I wasn't worried about my son using it to practice washing himself alone. My son loved this soap. He felt like a big boy having his own personal soap.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Poulis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Great product and my kids love it. The smell is very nice and lasts for a good while. Will definitely be buying this again.
customer_reviews.author: Koloa96756

customer_reviews.title: Broken Pump Plunger
customer_reviews.text: On opening the box I noticed the liquid had leaked out onto other items I had purchased. The pump plunger was broken - the replacement policy wanted me to send back the damaged item when all I needed was a functioning plunger. Sending back the item was more work so I didn't. Luckily I had a plunger from an old bottle of shampoo. The body wash works great and my son likes he smell - no complaints here !
customer_reviews.author: Steve Briones

customer_reviews.title: Not efficient packing product everywhere
customer_reviews.text: Came completely destroyed with shampoo everywhere I usually buy in store and will continue to do that
customer_reviews.author: lyssa

customer_reviews.title: Smells great. Really big too
customer_reviews.text: Smells really wonderful and is a very versatile children’s soap. It arrived broken though so I had to rescue what I could.

customer_reviews.title: Broken pump
customer_reviews.text: We love the scent and that it’s a 3 in 1 but the pump broke almost immediately

customer_reviews.title: Very good gor my kid, and also for me :-)
customer_reviews.text: Very good gor my kid, and also for me :-) good smell, good price, good quality of shampoo.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great ?
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving it 4 starts because the pump arrived broken other than that I really like this shampoo for my almost 2 year old .

customer_reviews.title: Great soap
customer_reviews.text: Very large bottle. Few months and still going. Nice, foamy soap. Great buy.

customer_reviews.title: I’m a big kid now
customer_reviews.text: My kids love it. It make them feel like a grown up. No more baby shampoo. Yay. It does a good job cleaning them up.

customer_reviews.title: Good product and my kids love it!
customer_reviews.text: Good scent and value for the money. My kids love it. I will buy it again.

customer_reviews.text: Perfect kids shampoo for the size and price. My kids loved the green apple scent

customer_reviews.title: Smells great!
customer_reviews.text: It smells good and my girls love it. It leaves hair shiny and smooth.

customer_reviews.text: I love the all in one of this for my toddler. The pump was damaged in transit. So thats a bummer

customer_reviews.text: My kids love the smell! Very easy for them to not over pour! Great buy!

product_meta.title: Suave Kids 3 in 1 Shampoo Conditioner Body Wash For Tear-Free Bath Time, Watermelon Wonder, Dermatologist-Tested Kids Shampoo 3 in 1 Formula 40 oz
product_meta.description: Scent:WatermelonMake bath time a fun and enjoyable experience with Suave Kids! This Watermelon Wonder 3 in 1 combines kids shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in one quick step, making it perfect for kids who can't sit still! The mild shampoo cleanses and refreshes kids’ hair, while the conditioner helps reduce split ends and eliminate tough tangles for soft and manageable hair. The body wash softens and smooths skin, as the subtle watermelon scent leaves kids’ hair and skin smelling fresh and looking clean until their next bath. This 3 in 1 shampoo conditioner body wash cleanser for kids is made with a tear-free, hypoallergenic formula that has been ophthalmologist-tested and dermatologist-tested to make sure your child has an enjoyable experience — and that bath time goes smoothly for you.For best use, squeeze a gum ball-sized amount to wet hair and lather into a wig of bubbles. Massage over wet skin. Rinse thoroughly, leaving behind soft, clean hair and skin. Try the Suave Kids Purely Fun Hair Detangler to make hair even easier to manage and style. Experiment with different hair products and scents, including Coconut, Peach, and Raspberry, until you find your kids’ favorite Suave shampoo, conditioner, and body wash. Suave Kids offers a range of hair products and skin products designed specifically for kids. Try our Silly Apple hair detangler to smooth out knots, or our Fresh Spider-Sense 3-in1 kids shampoo, hair conditioner and bodywash.
feature_bullets: Suave Kids Watermelon 3 in 1 includes shampoo, conditioner, and body wash in one
Suave 3 in 1 kid's shampoo has a tear-free formula for a happy bath time
This 3 in 1 kids shampoo conditioner body wash is dermatologically tested and gently cleanses and conditions hair and skin
As a kids shampoo, it cleans and detangles hair
As a kids conditioner, it leaves skin soft and smooth
Provides your child with a quick and easy bath time
